description:
Come on a journey to increase your leadership skills. How to set yourself up for success with Learoy Tonight will provide you with the skills and knowledge to become a great leader, for yourself and your team.

Why does goal setting have to happen? Can't you just work hard and reap the rewards that come from that? Without goals, how will you even know that you are successful? Setting goals is not only important, but also essential to developing your skills as a leader.

So how do you set a goal and make it stick? And what is a good goal? Knowing this can be the key to unlocking the success of your leadership for the long term. Being able to set a path and stick to it, having the perseverance to make it work, and then recognising when you have found success are all the things great leaders are made of.

Developing effective networking techniques is also a crucial part of planning for your future. You don't have to be the 'life of the party' but you do need to learn to be effective in your networking activities, how to avoid 'time-wasting', and how to take advantage of every day opportunities to build and maintain your network.

Career planning is the ongoing process of managing your professional development to achieve your career objectives. It's about knowing yourself and how others benefit from your skills, as well as building professional relationships that you can leverage in meaningful ways.

Each lecture in this course has been carefully selected for you to explore how to implement relevant and meaningful strategies to support you as a leader now and in the future.

This course will provide you with many tips and tricks you can utilize inside and out of your workplace, it will encourage and motivate you to really understand and support your team.

Learoy Tonight is a fresh business with interesting and modern ideas towards education. Many people take part in creating these courses – from subject matter experts, to researchers and designers – to ensure you are provided with the best learning experience and the most up to date information. We are excited about education and want to give you the opportunity to be the best you can be.

This course will take you approximately 30 to 45 minutes to complete and will cover the types of goals, how to set and achieve them. We will also work through the temporal model, defining how goals create motivation to succeed. We will then explore how to network, the importance of networking and the common networking mistakes before we work through different forms of networking and provide tips to assist you going forward. Our content will give you the opportunity to listen to experts and understand relevant models for you to use on your leadership journey to setting yourself up for success. This will be an experience to enjoy with a collection of videos, interviews and engaging imagery throughout our presentations.

This course is a small section of our Leadership-off the leash journey. If you would like to really challenge yourself, join us for the entire leadership experience.

What are you waiting for? Start tonight, be on your way to becoming an amazing leader tomorrow.
title: Leadership | How to Set Yourself up for Success
